    O

    Order - Class in Model
    Represents an order placed by a client for a product Contains info about the client, product, quantity and order ID
    Order() - Constructor for class Model.Order
    Default constructor for Order
    Order(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class Model.Order
    Constructs an Order with specified details
    OrderBLL - Class in BussinessLogic
    Business Logic Layer class that handles operations related to orders It communicates with the OrderDAO for database access and generates a Bill for each order
    OrderBLL() - Constructor for class BussinessLogic.OrderBLL
    Constructs an OrderBLL and initializes the OrderDAO
    OrderController - Class in PresentationLayer
    Controller class that manages the logic for handling orders in the application
    OrderController(OrderView) - Constructor for class PresentationLayer.OrderController
    Constructs the OrderController and initializes listeners for user actions
    OrderDAO - Class in DataAccess
    Data Access Object for the order entity Inherits generic operations from AbstractDAO
    OrderDAO() - Constructor for class DataAccess.OrderDAO
    Constructs a new OrderDAO Uses reflection in AbstractDAO to handle operations for the Client class
    orderId() - Method in record class Model.Bill
    Returns the value of the orderId record component.
    ordersButton - Variable in class PresentationLayer.MainView
     
    orderTable - Variable in class PresentationLayer.OrderView
     
    orderTableModel - Variable in class PresentationLayer.OrderView
     
    OrderView - Class in PresentationLayer
    GUI class for managing and placing orders Provides a form for selecting a clients and product, entering a quantity, and placing an order.
    OrderView() - Constructor for class PresentationLayer.OrderView
    Constructs an order management GUI window Initializes layout, input components, action buttons, and the orders table
